description: Brawny and brash, Eros Sin is just another insolent, ungrateful young football star failing all of his classes and getting by on a pretty face. Sent to the Divine Bitches for a proper education, Mistresses Lorelei and Cherry teach this boy a lesson using floggers, clothespins, paddles, humiliation, and a smothering that leaves him gasping between Mistress Torn's luscious tits. Schooled by the two powerful women, Eros repays the attention they've bestowed upon him with eager pussy licking, and they fuck his disrespectful hole until this defeated athlete is left whimpering "humility, discipline, gratitude" through the drool bubbling from behind his ball gag.
title: A Sinful Schooling
